abstract.t: This document describes a framework of a new scheme for trafficcontrol to achieve end-to-end QoS for interactive multimediaservices. The scheme is based on end-to-end measurement of networkresources by end systems. The network is assumed to fully supportthe priority control scheme specified in the Diffserv architecturefor QoS and SIP [1] for session control. Since the scheme relies onthe behavior of the end systems, this document also touches onmechanisms for monitoring end-system behavior.
